content.body: I've now encountered failures which are resolved by dynamically updating the given popoverList. If this is really required then the spec steps should be changed to reflect that.
Tyler Morgan: Let me know if you want any assistance with https://github.com/whatwg/meta/issues/318#issuecomment-2629775359
